channel.title: I need someone to host my server....:(
channel.description:
:) Pure - Pain....
my and the owners need a hoster as most of us are in uni and cannot find out the router.. if you host our server you will get admin rights... we are beging you....!
the server is a realy good one it has ; * kq * kbd * dk * mithril dragons * godwars dungeon and much much more ... oh and real barrows!!!!!!........
please if you would add me on nnnnnnmmmmm@hotmail.com
